name: Morituri Te Salutant
description: It's time to test your mettle in a Grecco-Roman-ish single adventure map, Morituri Te Salutant! Doomguy has found himself summoned to an ancient, crumbling villa - the court of the Red Emperor. The Emperor is conspicuously absent, but he and his cronies watch with great interest from afar as you rip and tear your way through his tests. Will you make it through the trials, or will you be split from nose to navel? Play and find out.

name: Otherworldly Ossuary
description:
Don't give up skeleton! Fight your way out of space purgatory.
You are already dead, but everything here wants you 7 feet under.

Otherworldly Ossuary﻿ is a small MBF21 single map with cramped puzzle-like combat.

name: Revenge of the Speeddemons!
description: REVENGE of the Speeddemons is the eighteenth Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series event. Featuring 7 maps, each from a unique author, ROTS promises to throw the player headfirst into an action movie of their own starring. Fit snugly into the lead role as you blast your way through hundreds of demons mercenaries across an occupied Earth. The Rowdy Rudy resource pack replaces nearly all of the monster bestiary as well as the majority of the weapons.

name: Simulacrum
description: Simulacrum is a set of 32 maps in MBF21 format by @muumi and @myolden. This set starts modestly but steadily climbs into challenge and slaughter territory in the later maps.

name: Crystal Cliffs
description: This is a medium to hard difficulty single map mixing up puzzles and small scale slaughter

name: We Live Inside A Dream
description:
We are like the dreamer who dreams, and then lives inside the dream...but who is the dreamer?

We Live Inside a Dream is a first person interactive experience combining elements of the FPS, horror, puzzle, driving and stealth genres. Experience the uncanny town of Snoqualmie: The Hotel, Double R Diner, The Sheriffs Department, The Convenience Store, The Red Room and much more.

Uncover the mystery of the missing Deputy and answer the question of...who is the dreamer?...but be cautious as the road may not even lead you there...

name: Grand Circuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare - Zomboss Down
description: Zomboss Down features a brand new Gardens & Graveyards map "Cactus Canyon," where Zombies have crash landed in the desert and need to fight their way to a local golf course and destroy a secret Plant facility located under the 18th hole. 8 new characters have also been added as well as hundreds of new CRAAAZY customization items to collect! In addition, this pack also contains hundreds of tuning/balance changes, and bug fixes.

name: Lost Chakras
description: A physics-based puzzle game made for all ages.

name: Project Walker
description: Attempt to escape the maze while being hunted by the Walkers.

name: Reverse Snake Extreme
description: Classic game of snake but with a twist. Control the food and try not to get eaten or touch the lava. Survive for four minutes and win or die trying.

name: Wild Eclipse
description: Help Pieto traverse dangerous terrain and avoid the natural disasters thrown at him.

name: Green Hell VR: The Spirits of Amazonia Part 1
description: In this story expansion, you will experience a new adventure that serves as a prequel to the main story of Green Hell VR. Once again, step into the shoes of Jake Higgins and do your best to gain the trust of the Mu’agi tribe, the chief of an indigenous Amazonian village. To do this, you must complete missions based on local legends, help tribe members, and provide supplies for the village. All of this, of course, is tailored specifically for VR.

name: Armada
description: Play as a slimebabe on her quest to face her nemesis, Armada.

name: Nomo Hideo no World Series Baseball
description:
A baseball game for the Sega Game Gear released as part of the World Series Baseball series in Japan.

The game features an endorsement by Japanese baseball player Hideo Nomo, who had recently played his first season for Major League Baseball with the Los Angeles Dodgers.

name: Abyss of Empires:The Mythology
description: Abyss of Empires is a strategy game where you build and rule your own land, explore unknown territories, and fight for survival. Choose from different civilizations, recruit and command Heroes with unique skills, and assemble units for battle. With numerous maps and endless strategic possibilities, you’ll lead your empire to victory against enemies.

name: Bunker Game
description: A short, post-apocalypse, story-driven point-and-click game about companionship and legacy.

name: Oyasumii
description: Relive the nostalgia with Oyasumii, a horror and exploration game inspired by PSX and N64 classics. Enter liminal spaces and face surreal terrors in an adventure that challenges your skills and sanity. Are you ready to relive the golden age of video games with Oyasumii?

name: Sonic Nexus
description: Sonic Nexus was a game created by Nexus Team, headed by Slingerland. The game used the Retro Sonic engine by The Taxman who joined the project in 2008. The game began development in the summer of 2006 and had three demo releases, two at the Sonic Amateur Games Expo and one during the summer of 2008. It is a critically acclaimed fangame, garnering comments such as, "absolute perfection of the classic Sonic style" from SAGE visitors and various blogs. The character lineup consisted of Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles.

name: Murderlings
description: Control a murder of crows and hunt prey before you starve to death. A finished version of its game jam prototype for IndieCade's Community Jam 2015. The theme was cooperation.

name: Loser Simulator
description: The game "Loser Simulator" invites players to plunge into the life of an ordinary person named Bari, for whom everything goes awry. We have to help him overcome a series of failures and ridiculous situations in one day.

name: Otome Sekai no Arukikata
description: Set in a near-future Japan after its society became completely dominated by women due to the rampancy of radical feminists and the country introducing the "Gender Segregation Act" decades ago, you are Katagiri Yui, originally a child soldier in the defense forces who eventually got to hid in a remote village under a fake identity, who is ordered by Mother, an social management AI, to attend the training school of the Security Force, a women's armed forces with your adoptive sister.

name: Dontrel Dolphin 2
description: Mr. Grim has stolen 60 power gems from the palace, and he also captured a lovely dolphin by the name of May. Dontrel arrives at the palace to recover the gems throughout the realm in an epic quest to save his girlfriend. Here is where the action starts.

name: Minotaur
description: Minotaur was a 2012 horror game by Puppet Combo (formerly Pig Farmer Productions). The game never exited the Alpha development stage but was remade into Power Drill Massacre, in 2015.

name: Color Bump 3D
description: Color Bump 3D's main principle is pretty simple: you are controlling a small ball that is always moving forward. On your way, there are a few obstacles that you need to get through. There’s a small problem however, because you can only touch obstacles that are the same color as your ball. If you touch an obstacle with a different color, the game ends and you need to start from the beginning.

name: Rectangulong
description: A silly game about hitting a ball back and forth. Play against a friend or a computer in 12 levels awesome style.

name: Britney Spears' Theme Park
description: A fan game for the pop icon of the century

name: Count Masters
description: Count Masters offers unique gameplay where your main objective will be to defeat your opponents and avoid obstacles in the process. It’s interesting in a sense that your army can only get larger by walking through a gate. The number written on the gate signifies the number by which your army will grow larger. Pick the right gate so that you get as many warriors as possible. You will need the warriors to defeat all of your enemies.

name: Decor Dream
description: Decor Dream is a match-3 puzzle game where you solve puzzles to unlock furniture and redecorate clients’ homes. Choose items from a catalog and design rooms with different styles to complete makeovers.

name: Happy Hospital
description: Happy Hospital is a time management game where you run a medical center. Play as a doctor or nurse to treat patients, or take on the role of an administrator to build and upgrade hospital facilities. Help patients, earn money, and manage your hospital to create the perfect medical center.

name: Rise of Castles
description: Build and upgrade your castle, forge powerful legions led by heroes and dragons. Dive into strategy with a comprehensive tech tree, unique specialization towers, developing crucial attributes for the advancement of your empire. Form strategic alliances in epic seasons.

name: ZDog Hotel Hero Z
description: ZDog Hotel Hero Z is a game where a dog must fight in a hotel to collect as many bones as possible within a minute

name: Subject:Love
description:
Love. A feeling coveted by writers and detested by those who live by logic.

A natural sensation that arises at the most unexpected moment to bring out the best in you.

But what happens when someone who has never felt it before tries to understand it? How far can this person go?

A heartless witch and six confused boys join this journey for an answer.

Now. Will they find love, or will another feel awake inside them?

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 12
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty: Warzone - Combat Pack: Shogun
description: Sin descripción

name: Fall Guys: Icons Pack
description: Play for the Crown with the Fall Guys 'Icons Pack'. Featuring Aloy, Ratchet & Clank costumes plus additional cosmetics!

name: Secret Neighbor: Welcome Pack
description: Dive into the world of Secret Neighbor with this FREE pack for PS Plus members. Unlock Neighbor's Tennis costume and Leader's Basketball attire for a warm-up round of finding the basement keys

name: Fortnite: Guardians Of the Galaxy Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat 11: Double Feature Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Who is God
description: An endless vertical autojumping game in which players choose one of four gods to compete for high scores

name: Wonder Ball
description: An action 3D platformer with fast-paced gameplay and low-poly style graphics, inspired by the greatest classics of the genre. Full of platforming levels, combat arenas, many collectibles and secrets. Explore five worlds of Cyberland and save them from the malicious Virus and its army of bots!

name: Mini Cup
description: In this game, you’ll face off against a goalkeeper from the rival country of each match. Choose the nation you support and try to score as many penalties as possible, with the goalkeeper increasing in speed each time you score.

name: TomHanksFrThMmrs
description: A Point-and-Click starring Tom Hanks. Made for Hanks Jam.

name: Buster Baxter: Lung Defender
description: Sin descripción

name: 12 Vengeful Ghosts
description:
12 Vengeful Ghosts is Touhou Project meets 12 Angry Men.

This game is a narrative bullet hell very loosely inspired by the aforementioned film. You play as one of twelve ghosts responsible for deciding the fate of a mortal, but those other ghosts aren't nearly as forgiving as you.

name: Aoki Shinjuku
description:
Shinjuku, 2017. Sharp rise in temperature resulted in flood of huge territories.
Deck runs an "information store" and gets a request to investigate a "NOKIA" program. At the same time a big package is delivered that turns out to be a girl who awakens from Cold Sleep and remembers only Shinjuku of 20th century prior to the huge flood...

name: Myror i Brallan
description: Myror i Brallan [Ants in the Pants] is a Swedish children's game based on the children's TV programme of the same name. The game was published in 2001 by Young Genious.

name: Naisu Gaisu Survivors
description:
Try out this small and charming take on the survivors genre

Fight hordes of enemies and level up to try to beat the final boss.

Every level up you have the choice between:

Getting stronger and choosing from a variety of different power-ups
Adding to your fina lscore multiplier

Balance your strength with your score multiplier to try to gain the highest score possible.

Choose between 5 different starting characters characters and 3 levels.
More characters are there to be unlocked!

name: The Caldecott Caper
description: The lowest form of life in the Sixth World is that of the corporate rent-a-cop. You are paid a paltry wage for the privilege of defending the megacorps' ostentatious wealth from the desperate gangers of the Orkland Sprawl. Enter a world of turmoil, greed, and violence, as you struggle for survival with the help of a few hand-picked allies.

name: Golden Axe
description: The Sega Genesis/Mega Drive port of Golden Axe has two additional modes, a training mode (Beginner) and an enemy Battle mode (Duel).

name: Golden Axe
description: An exclusive port of Golden Axe, based on the Sega Genesis version, which was included in the Game Boy Advance version of Sega Smash Pack.

name: Pokemon R.O.W.E.
description: Pokemon ROM hack made with the objective of being an open world version of Hoenn with a lot of Quality of Life changes to make team building easy without having to breed for anything and a lot of replay value with a lot of modes that changes how you play the game and what kind of team you can use to beat the league since all the Pokémon are obtainable from the start so you can try any team you can think of, there are also a lot of features from future games like Wondertrade, Following Pokémon, Updated mechanics up to Gen 8, etc.

name: LXD: Red Honey
description: A strange machine appeared in the sky, breaking down much of the plant life across the region into their core elements, including your humble garden. Collect and harness the power of these fragments in order to rebuild your world piece by piece. Explore 6 unique areas in order to find and defeat the evil that sought your world's destruction.

name: Pense Bem: Animais
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Artes
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Ciência e Corpo Humano
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Ecologia
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Esportes
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Conhecimentos Gerais
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Geografia
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: História
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Informática
description: Sin descripción

name: Pense Bem: Desafio
description: Sin descripción

name: Dolls' Domain
description: You find yourself in a dollhouse - can you escape, or will you meet your fate? Navigate through the escape room-style puzzles, and avoid being caught by the creatures who exist in this place, and gain your freedom from the dollhouse!

name: Pense Bem
description: Master System port of Pense Bem, which itself was based on a toyline by Tec Toy. It is an educational quiz game and usually is considered as a bundle 10 different games.

name: Some Munnings
description:
As the world's foremost expert on Sir Alfred James Munnings, only you can differentiate his art from a series of creative works!

Some Munnings are present, but watch out for tricky counterfeits and increasingly-complicated certification requirements!

name: Funny World Quiz
description: Funny world quiz is a challenging trivia game with fun facts questions about what each country is famous for. Most topics are about culture, natural wonders, world records, strangle laws, curious things in politics and history. It is NOT like the simple geography questions in many other apps.

name: Tarzan VR
description: Sin descripción

name: 2048 Boys
description: Sin descripción

name: Guess the Flag!
description:
Embark on a global journey with the game “Guess the Flag!”

Test your knowledge of 255 countries, islands and international organizations in 6 addictive modes. Test your memory by matching the flag to the name of a country or play the reverse mode. If you are already an expert in flag knowledge, you can try the mode in which you have to write the name of the country yourself. Feel the thrill of matching locations to a country and, for a change, immerse yourself in the unpredictable random mode that combines all the challenges.

name: Hentai Games Collection
description: Meet fantastic girls in the biggest bundle of the hentai games along with all DLCs.

name: Itazura Madness
description: Itazura Madness is an first-person cartoony roguelike with 4 playable characters, 7 bosses, 100+ items and 60+ weapons

name: Basic Platformer
description: A platformer with puzzle elements made for the Vircon32 virtual console.

name: BFDI: Branches
description: BFDI: Branches is an all-new platformer game with Firey, Leafy, Coiny, and Pin! Featuring multiple characters with varied gameplay, a story mode with branching paths, a complete level editor, and an online level browser!

name: Crank It Up!
description: Sin descripción

name: Run Forrest Run
description: A side-scrolling Puzzle 'n' Run made for the Hanks Jam

name: Nonogram Animals
description: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Drifto: Infinite Touge
description: No campaign, no cutscenes, just beautifully simple scenery and a whole lot of tyre smoke. How far can you get?

name: Died
description: Survive amidst colleagues turned into monsters due to a virus leak in this horror game. Explore the 10-floor underground lab to uncover the secrets.

name: Dice Player One: Trailer
description: "Dice Player One" is a roguelike strategy game where dice reign supreme! Roll your dice, seize pivotal moments, and transform limited chances into boundless opportunities. Conquer challenges, unearth hidden secrets, and master the art of dice manipulation!

name: GameLib
description: GameLib is an application that brings together several 3D multiplayer mini-games, such as Werewolves Online, Ludo, Connect 4 (4 in a row). GameLib features an in-app voice chat function, so you can communicate with other players during the game.

name: For Whom the Stars Shine
description: "Some stories are best told to none," she whispered. Long ago, the stars disappeared. Then, a man returned them. Few would believe such a thing; fewer still can recall how he bent heaven's ear. However, you won't find the tale in books or archives—only in the hearts of those who were there.

name: Pennon and Battle
description: "Pennon and Battle" is a turn-based strategy war game. As a lord, you will play a crucial role in the revival of the kingdom! Lead heroes and armies to expand territory in Ruachland, utilize tactics and magic to eliminate enemy forces, and create your own legend!

name: Project Cube
description: Project CUBE - Its a game that forces you to replay the level to learn more. The game gets increasinly harder after level. Can you fight all the enemies and finish the levels?

name: Druid
description: Games created by people with disabilities that can be played by people with disabilities. ARPG like RTS. No double-clicking, no right-clicking, no wheel, just one click. In the Town, click on the right border to move the map. You can select multiple characters by dragging them.

name: Flying Tobacco Eggs
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Flying Tobacco Eggs, an exciting arcade game with pixel graphics and addictive gameplay!

name: MoonMan Adventures
description: Lunar was on a routine mission when something went wrong. He crashed on a hostile planet and must now find a way home.

name: Call Me Hero
description: Players will transform into the male protagonist Lin Feng, meet three beautiful women with vastly different appearances and personalities, and embark on an exciting love journey with them, becoming their heroes in the process.

name: Red Trees Rail. CO
description: Red Trees Rail Co is a VR Horror Train simulator set in a Redwood Forest. Work a tiny night train by yourself, transporting passengers from town to town.

name: Getting There
description: Getting There is a narrative adventure game telling the story of the world after what is only known as The Collision. After the death of her lover Kirsten, Lauren gets in her van and journeys across the strange and quiet world in search of civilisation.

name: Jaro Adventures
description: Jaro adventures is a 2d action/adventure platformer. You play as a character Jaro and through levels try to defeat enemies that get in your way. Try to collect as many coins as those will buy you character upgrades.

name: Two Doors
description: Immerse yourself in a gripping horror game where you repeatedly enter the same room. Spot subtle changes and choose the correct door to advance. With 3 difficulty levels, this game offers a thrilling challenge for every player. Will you survive the nightmare?

name: Nowhere Near
description: Do you believe in ghosts? As a skeptical video blogger, you will travel to France to one of the most cursed places - the abandoned Lagarde psychiatric hospital. Will you be able to capture something. or someone.

name: Resonating Worlds
description: Resonating Worlds is a Turn-based strategy game, with a lot of Character customization and progression. Mysterious towers have appeared in the world of Atuhm. These towers are a connection between worlds. But the towers bear a dark secret, that waits to be uncovered...

name: Tour de Drone
description: Tour de Drone - Race Your drone around A.I. enhanced 3D photorealistic holographic paintings of locations from around the world.

name: Brick Breaker Infinity
description: Break bricks, collect power-ups, endless levels for high scores. Test your skills, adaptability, and strategy. Addictive and fun! Let's play!

name: Z-Factor
description: Story-driven RPG with survival elements. Open seamless world, first person view. Adventures on an island where intelligent life has been destroyed by a zombie virus.

name: Rogue Defense
description: The first of its kind, a Tower Defense Roguelike. Unlock, build, upgrade, expand, and defend with a continuously expanding path from multiple directions which you can influence.

name: The InBetween
description: The InBetween is a 2D, action-packed yet emotional Undertale-Metroidvania in which your fate, as well as the fate of an infected world, lies in your skills and choices.

name: Cute Dogs Slide
description: Cute Dogs Slide is a fun game where you rearrange tiles to complete adorable dog pictures. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts, it challenges your skills and offers a delightful experience with each cute dog image you solve. Ideal for all ages!

name: Garden Paradise
description: "Garden Paradise" is a casual and relaxing game that you can freely design your ideal garden by dragging and placing various units. The game offers a wide variety of unit types and you combine these elements to create unique garden layouts.

name: Solridge
description: Solridge is an educational video game aligned with third-grade Common Core competencies. As the player, you will obtain gold by helping the townsfolk with their problems. If you want to save the village from disaster, you must continue gathering gold and growing stronger!

name: NanoDeath
description: "NanoDeath" - A 2D roguelike-y game where you are a nano-based pathogen sent to destroy a human's body with intense combat and tactical decisions.

name: Parse-O-Rhythm
description: Parse-O-Rhythm is a rhythm game about slashing errors in files to fix them. Slice and dice your way through files with nothing but the mouse and two buttons!

name: Rust Rivalry
description: A futuristic sci-fi first person shooter where combatants fight for the fate of their home.

name: Persnippety
description: Never lose a clipboard snippet again. Easily copy, paste, and sync text and images from your clipboard.

name: Truck Parking Simulator VR
description: Truck Parking Simulator VR is a fully interactive, realistic and immersive parking experience. But also an open world where you can deliver goods by truck. The game has one of the best truck physics simulations in VR.

name: Abrakajumpa
description: Jump your way to the top!

name: Future Swashbuckler
description: This is a swordplay game in which you fight well for five days to get a good evaluation from your employer. You fight by switching between controlling two characters.

name: Nakamers: La Huida
description: Escapa del colapso de una civilización que está a punto de extinguirse. Acompaña a Xioon en busca de su familia perdida mientras intentas ponerte a salvo de los desprendimientos y sorteando los ríos de lava. Sumérgete en una historia épica llena de emociones.

name: Codename: God
description: Randall is your typical nerdy kid living a normal, unexciting life in the 80s. Secretly in love with the most popular girl in school and bullied by the soccer team gang, one day he meets you, a divine entity who can change everything!

name: Medieval Conquest
description: Welcome to the world of medieval battles and heroic deeds! In this game you will go on an exciting journey through the era of knightly tournaments and great battles.

name: SteamStar
description: Sin descripción

name: Ima Survivor
description: IMA SURVIVOR - Shipwrecked on a remote island, You have to try to survive on Your own.

name: Shadow of Pharos
description: Shadow of Pharos is a short first-person horror game.

name: Troma Presents Poultrygeist
description: Crack the case of a chicken massacre and prevent a town of lawn mower lovers and suburban chicken farmers from destroying each other while managing a looming magical threat.

name: Timeout
description: Timeout is a fast-paced deck-building + team strategy game. Venture into a retro pixel-art style world, organize a team of up to 3 characters to build independent decks for them, challenge enemies on the timeline in ATB turn-based battles, and ultimately achieve victory

name: Confidential Mission
description: Join the fight and make your mark in the battle for global peace in Confidential Mission.

name: SOF: Enemy from the future
description: Lead the SOF squad and defend the world against alien invasion! Engage in thrilling turn-based battles and uncover the mysteries of enigmatic extraterrestrials. Your time has come – join the fight and safeguard our future!

name: Starlines
description: Explore the galaxy along with a beautiful girl and imbibed incredible feeling from the exciting brain of your gameplay.

name: Picterra
description: Explore a colourful world full of interesting flora and fauna to document with your camera and notebook

name: Dead for Dread
description: Dead for Dread is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a brave hero who goes into the dark labyrinths to retrieve a stolen artifact. Embark on a dangerous journey through mysterious dungeons full of mysteries and sinister creatures.

name: Mechieval
description: The twilight of the plague-ravaged Middle Ages. Pilot a five-story-high mech, unleashing torrents of ammunition, dancing with magic, and hunting the demons spreading pestilence in this frenzied top-down shooter.

name: Figure Adventure
description: "Figure Adventure" is a trendy game with the theme of hand-made figures, which integrates card cultivation and placement and hang-up gameplay!

name: Welcome Home
description: Welcome Home is a bone-chilling horror walking simulator that plunges you into a world of terror and intrigue. Set in a decrepit and sinister house that you have just purchased, this game will test your courage as you navigate through the eerie halls of your new home.

name: Meow Path
description: A puzzle game in which you have to figure out how to draw a path across the entire board. To lead the cat to its favorite toy

name: Little Herbal Baker
description: Little Herbal Baker is a cozy and laid-back game where you play as Lilia, a novice baker who has freshly arrived in a town called ‘MILKYWOOD’ in the fantastical world. Taking over a bakery formerly managed by a master baker, you are now embarking on your journey to become a master baker.

name: Ragnarok Age of Heroes
description: Ragnarok has struck, the gods have fallen, and Yggdrasil has collapsed. As one of the surviving humans in the last refuge, you face harsh environments and threats from other races. Bereft of technology and divine protection, humans must rely on their own strength to rise in this new era of heroes.

name: Widen
description: It should only be a short trip through the woods... He seems to lose himself and mix up reality with his own mind. Experience Widen as a new definition of psychological horror

name: Holy Light
description: It is a popular elimination game with its dazzling color matching and extremely smooth visual expression.

name: Project Juggler
description: FPS/Task Management Action Game

name: Tehnodrom
description: "Tehnodrom" offers exciting gameplay, a variety of enemies and weapons, and the ability to make strategic decisions that affect the course of the game. The game is intended for fans of casual games in the 2D platform style who love challenges and want to test themselves as a brave tehnodrom pilot.

name: Crimson Capes
description: Crimson Capes is a soulslike Action-RPG taking place in a Sword & Sorcery setting. Engage in fluid 2D pixel art swordplay, hunt witches, track monsters and experience the age of high adventure.

name: Roll Five
description: Roll Five is the dice game roguelike. Play this exciting deckbuilder where you compose creative dice figures, discover your favorite prisms, all in a pixel art medieval fantasy ambiance.

name: Where wh..?
description: "Where wh..?" ("何处") is a point and click puzzle game based on Lowpoly art style, you need to find the different and hidden resources in the screen, travel through nine worlds, explore the unknown areas, various gameplay, melodious music, suitable for all people to get started easily.

name: Hunt Me
description: HUNT ME is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Gather the ingredients for the ritual, weaken the threat and banish it. Be careful, you're also the prey!

name: Hidden Cat Memories
description: Explore a surreal hand-drawn world in Hidden Cat Memories. Find cat souls and help them remember their favorite moments with their humans. Each discovery transforms the cat and reveals her touching memory. Immerse yourself in this unique hidden object adventure.

name: Alien Strike: Blasting the Intruders
description: The earth has been invaded by aliens, and even though they are still in training, a group of soldiers are trying to save their city while trying to understand why it happened so quickly.

name: ZombCube
description: ZombCube is a first-person, cross-platform, zombie survival, wave based game. Play solo or with friends all over the world destroying the evil ZombCube's. Use teamwork, leadership, and skills to be the best and rank on the leaderboards.

name: Slide!
description: Slide is a Puzzle Game where you control both the protagonist and his enemy, in it you are tasked with finding ways to defeat your enemy Angry Man, be it with a sword or using the environment, every level features multiple ways to beat them and the game features over 20 of them!

name: Times Tables Games
description: Get ready to multiply the fun with Times Tables Games!

name: Creepy Tales
description: Creepy Tales is a cooperative horror and survival game for 1 to 4 players. The players are orphans in an orphanage run by a priest possessed by an evil entity. Defeat him, survive, and save your friends!

name: Rolldown
description: Race against your friends in this fast paced and exciting game. The goal is simple: be the first ball to roll down to the bottom of the hill.

name: Rubber Sharks
description: Plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet poolside life with the amazing company of peaceful Rubber Sharks. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. But could there be a mystery hidden in this peaceful scene, or even more?

name: Psiplex
description: An anime-styled social sci-fi SRPG game. As an inspector, navigate through the Megapolis where material production has reached its zenith, and confront the unending conflict between psychics and ordinary citizens. Only by shattering all the rules of this beautiful new world can you achieve rebirth.

name: Escape From Castle Frankenstein
description: Escape from Castle Frankenstein is a thrilling platformer game where you play as Frankenstein's monster, a creation desperate to flee the dark halls of Dr. Frankenstein's ominous castle. Will you outsmart Dr. Frankenstein and gain your freedom, or will you be trapped within these walls forever?

name: Ballz
description: Relax your brain with the ultimate time killer!

name: The Great Adventures of Nedmapagmahal
description: Action rage game that will test your limits

name: Air Sea Modern Conflict
description: Dive into the heart-pounding action of "Air Sea Modern Conflict," an exhilarating game where you take direct control of powerful ships and aircraft to annihilate waves of relentless enemies. As a skilled commander, you'll pilot various naval vessels, from agile destroyers and stealthy submarines to massive aircraft carriers, each armed with an array of devastating weapons. Take to the skies with an impressive selection of aircraft, including nimble fighters, heavy bombers, drones and versatile helicopters, to dominate both land and sea.

name: Agnostiko Origins
description:
Welcome to 1890's steampunk Philippines.
where there are mysterious monsters roaming around manila
What you will encounter here is based on Philippine Mythology
You will play the role of the "man in the red scarf"
explore the mysterious mansion and discover the truth behind this nightmare
Inspired by 90s 16bit art style
from the characters to the background everything is created
in style using pixel art like the 4th generation consoles.
A Filipino Metroidvania game that features Filipino Folklore like Aswang, Kapre, Tikbalang, Manananggal, duwende, whitelady and more.

name: Moeyo Butaman!?
description: A canceled platformer from EIM.

name: 24: The Mobile Game
description:
Your mobile phone is a portal into the world of CTU. Your mission begins now. Use your 'spy phone' to control the mission and guide Jack Bauer and other CTU agents through the longest day of their lives.

In "24", The Mobile Game, you will require the skills of CTU's finest to save the day. With an array of gadgetry and agents at your disposal you must take on a variety of missions. But remember: the clock is always ticking... Use infrared satellite surveillance equipment, phone tracing and electronic lock picks, to unravel the conspiracy before time runs out.

name: AneeMate
description: AneeMate is a fantasy world creature extraction shooter merging a childhood nostalgia with 21st century innovation. AneeMates are the mythical creatures you’ll truly own, introducing magical powers, unique designs, and body structures. They’re designed to trigger the cute sentiment of little kitties while instilling a crippling sense of imminent danger. Their home is mortally threatened. Go save them all!

name: Don't Let Her In
description: a short body horror story about being alone.

name: BlueTooth BiPlanes
description: Sin descripción

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Mobile for GREE
description:
Ryu Ga Gotoku Mobile for GREE is a mobile game developed by SEGA for featured phones, Android and iOS.
It's a spin-off of the Yakuza series and it first launched in 2011 in Japan, but eventually closed in 2013.

name: Gunnel Vision
description:
Gunnel Vision was made in 3 days for the Blockjam on Humble Bundle and was developed by Ludosity. It is now available for free on itch.io and is featured in Scrap Pack 4 on Daniel Remar's website.

Gunnel Vision is all about guns. The more guns the better.
Pick up a gun - shoot a gun. Pick up two guns, shot with two guns. Pick up 100 guns - MAYHEM! In Gunnel Vision you don't need an inventory - use your entire arsenal at once until your vision is blocked by it - with nothing left to see but the enemy dead center.

name: Ryuu ga Gotoku Kizuna
description:
Yakuza Kizuna, in japanese Ryu Ga Gotoku Kizuna, was a mobile game published by GREE for iOS and Android as a spin-off of the Yakuza series.
It was a free-to-play social card game, but it closed after just 5 months.

name: DanceDanceRevolution World
description: DanceDanceRevolution World is the 18th installment of the DanceDanceRevolution series.

name: Pokémon Fire Red Extended
description:
All Pokémon from the first to the eighth generation are available for capture!
This project is recommended to people who have never had the opportunity to play Pokémon before.
Some people know Pokémon anime, so this project is an excellent choice to be the first experience for this public target.
As I said before, our journey will only be in Kanto.
Unlike Pokémon Fire Red vanilla, the players don't have access to the seven islands.

name: Fatal Force: Earth Assault
description: Just imagine that a great explosion that thundered on Tunguska in 1908, created a unique zone in Siberia. Newcomers on the Tunguska do not intend to leave. On the contrary, they are determined to capture the entire Earth. It is clear, that these humanoids are absolutely unaware of history of our planet and are completely out of date about consequences for them. Well we have to make it hot for them for one more time. Take a greatcoat, the mother-planet is calling!

name: Matterhorn
description: Avoiding attacking birds and downward-rolling boulders you have to reach the top of the Matterhorn.

name: Sylvie Miniature
description:
Sylvie's world was destroyed again. What will you find in the rubble?

Sylvie miniature is a "seven game" — 7x7 tiles, 7x7 screens, 7x7 world.

name: Dontrel Dolphin
description: May Dolphin is in trouble, and Dontrel must save her. Travel across treacherous landscapes as you fight and dodge your way to victory. Use Cannon Caliber, the magical sword, to aid Dontrel during his quest.

name: Love & Cards
description: Porn and Cards is an adult visual novel/turn-based card game with stunning 2D visuals and a fun, immersive narration in the Galactic Wild West

name: The Isles of the Seven Moons
description: The Isles of the Seven Moons is a First-Person Ritual Sacrifice Adventure where you explore a surreal and relaxing environment while completing an ancient ritual in order to meet the Moon-Sage.

name: Super Yum Yum
description: Sin descripción

name: Fanastasis
description: A spirit attempts to find its memories.

name: SeekIt: The Isle of Mem
description: An educational adventure for Apple II.

name: Argus
description: Medieval fantasy game about religion and philosophy, featuring yuri and ossan bromance.

name: Might and Magic Mobile
description: For centuries, Erathia has been devastated by a war between humans and demons. To make matters worse, the king is being held prisoner by the demon armies. The hero, Ewan, is sent to rescue the king by a mysterious nobleman. His quest will result in encounters with an elf archer, a captain of mercenaries and countless other friends and foes. The monstrous kidnappers will try to set traps in these hostile environments, but any hero knows to proceed with caution when dealing with demons.

name: Vitris
description: A tetris-clone style puzzle game for the Vircon32.

name: Fierce Soldier
description: A side-scrolling shooter for the Vircon32.

name: 100 Waiting Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the funny waiting situations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artworks of While Waiting themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. ️ Can you find them all? ️

name: Simple Tennis
description: A Pong clone for Vircon32.

name: MineSweeper
description: A clone of the famous puzzle game for the Vircon32.

name: 100 Aztec Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the Azcte-themed with Cats in Ancient World! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Ancient themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: SeekIt: Max Dublin's Treasure
description:
Max Dublin's Treasure is a trivia learning game for the Apple II.

Max Dublin has hidden his treasure of silver, gold, and jewels throughout the land, and has unfortunately torn the treasure map into pieces. With the aid of Mr. Light, the player must retrieve the map pieces to Max Dublin's three treasures. The player must travel with Max Dublin to a number of exotic locales, and using the New Book of Knowledge Encyclopedia Volume A published by Grolier, must answer questions about these locations. Correctly answered questions help the player locate map pieces. As the player travels, they must spend money to refuel their plane, and they risk running out of fuel money before collecting all map pieces if they do not answer enough questions correctly. After collecting all pieces for the silver map, the player progresses to the more challenging gold and jewel maps. As the player searches for treasure, a mystery man wearing a bandanna attempts to sabotage the player's effort by stealing money or fuel if questions are answered incorrectly.

name: Stray Cats in Cozy Town
description: Welcome to Cozy Town, where every day is International Cat Day! Be a part of a village community where every stray is respected, loved and fed. Explore the charming streets and alleys to discover all the stray cats in this hidden-object game.

name: Click on piña coladas together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ piña coladas in this panoramic level?

name: Click On Staplers Together
description:
Can you and your friends find all 100+ staplers in this panoramic level?

Search an incredibly detailed hand-drawn environment for staplers. When you find one, click it to mark it as yours. The game is won once everything has been found, and a scoreboard will be displayed showing who found what. No time limit, just you and your friends. Singleplayer is available too!

name: Search All: Veggies
description: This is a game in the "search for objects" genre in which you need to find all the vegetables in a large location. Vegetables will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to barely noticeable places

name: The Story of Miss Mouse
description: An educational game for Apple II.

name: Jet Set Radio: MiniMix
description: A year in the making, it's finally here. Jet Set Radio MiniMix v1.0

name: Mahjong
description: A mahjong solitaire game for the Vircon32.

name: Department of Collections
description: A tasked based procedural online co-op sci-fi horror game that can be played both casually or more hardcore
A 2048 port for Vircon32.

name: Moon Bingo
description:
Moon Bingo is an educational game about rhyming words.

The player and their opponent try to fill in a 2x4 bingo card by matching rhyming words. Each space contains a word, and a word appears in the middle of the screen. If the player has a rhyme to the displayed word, they need to type in the correct rhyme from their board, and that space is taken. If there is no rhyming match, the word should be passed on to their opponent for a chance to score. The first player to fill their board wins. The game allows for single-player versus computer or two-player games with three separate levels of difficulty.

name: Rhymo's Falling Star
description:
Rhymo's Falling Star is 1 - 2 player educational word game for the Apple II.

Players compete in 3 slightly different challenges, where they must type matching rhyming words. In each challenge, the player must complete a total of 15 rhyming words to either help Rhymo catch a falling star, save creatures from a dying planet, or reach his spaceship. Each challenge contains 2 different difficulty levels. At the easier level, the player must type the two words that rhyme. At the harder level, the player is given a word with the first letter missing, and the player must choose 2 of 5 letters that will complete this word. As the player successfully answers questions, they get closer to their goal of helping Rhymo.

name: Habbo Hotel: Origins
description: Habbo Hotel: Origins is a restored version of the 2005 version of Habbo Hotel with a fresh, community-led approach.

name: Rhyme-A-Line
description:
Rhymo's Falling Star is 1 - 2 player educational word game for the Apple II.

Players compete in 3 slightly different challenges, where they must type matching rhyming words. In each challenge, the player must complete a total of 15 rhyming words to either help Rhymo catch a falling star, save creatures from a dying planet, or reach his spaceship. Each challenge contains 2 different difficulty levels. At the easier level, the player must type the two words that rhyme. At the harder level, the player is given a word with the first letter missing, and the player must choose 2 of 5 letters that will complete this word. As the player successfully answers questions, they get closer to their goal of helping Rhymo.

name: Rhyme Land
description:
Rhyme Land is a simple rhyming game for the Apple II.

Players can choose from a number of different cartoon animals, including: foxes, cats, mice, dragons, frogs, bees, and snakes. They then must choose if the displayed words rhyme or don't rhyme with the animal.

description: Sin descripción

description:
You are a ball, you must dodge things. It is as easy as that!

Simple one button controls yet still challenging.

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman Zero
description: Experience the revival of a retro but timeless co-op action classic

description: Sin descripción

name: I Love Finding Cats & Pups - Collector's Edition
description: Have a pawsome adventure finding cats and pups!

description: Discover So Much Stuff!

name: Goblins
description: Sin descripción

name: Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus
description: PS1 Emulation Port of "Oddworld: Abe's Exodus" for PS4/PS5

name: Football Clubs
description: Welcome to FIFpro's officially authorized operating card football game. A console game experience using 3D original engine and next-generation modeling. Collect the world's top star lineup and instantly compete with your friends in a global game.

name: Rise & Fall: Online Digital Edition
description: Risse & Fall is a game involving strategic units positioning, territory control and opportunity seizing designed by Christophe Boelinger (Dungeon Twister, Earth Reborn, Archipelago, Living Planet...). Each player leads a nation trying to expand and progress in a fantasy world.

name: The Croaker: The Ice
description: An Ice-Themed Expansion Pack with tons of new levels!

name: Star: M
description: Diverse worlds, diverse battlefields, diverse gameplay, diverse appreciation, and diverse fun!

name: Sakura Priestess and Shikigami Mountain
description: Sin descripción

name: Queen of The Hill
description: You are a Queen Ant who has taken her colony's survival into her own hands. Fight off hoards of enemies while also being a good mother Hatch swarms of (questionably intelligent) children to gather food for the nest Aid your swarm as it grows up big and strong

name: Keepers 1477
description: The classic beat em up game is now here with the medieval Ottoman theme, with 3d environment and unique features offered by the unreal engine and its physics engine, magnificent illustrative drawings! Dash towards the zombies, fight with your own combinations and save the capital from zombies!

name: Redemption
description: A first-person action horror game set in a military research facility infested with dangerous creatures, navigate your escape while battling to stay alive in this enigmatic location.

name: Re:Connect
description: "Re:Connect" is a one-stroke Sokoban programming puzzle game that reconnects the rules. Become an AI that fixes system glitches in the world of the Internet and reconnect the "bugs" in the world!

name: Cyberpunk Inquisitor
description: The world's first rogue-lite point-and-click adventure! As an Inquisitor in a dystopian cyberpunk world, enter a Megabuilding and solve the immersive, procedurally-generated murders within. Talk to witnesses, collect evidence, identify the culprit and unmask the truth!

name: Skylark 64
description: A 64-bit 3D Collect-a-thon Platformer where you play as A flying squirrel who can glide, run, jump and roll in open non-linear levels collecting Acorns, Soul Leaves and 7 pieces of armor with unique power-ups! You can even play with a friend in Split-Screen Co-op!

name: Project Evolve
description: Take control of Azula in this action-packed beat-em-up adventure game, where you will recover your abilities as you progress through the simulation. Use close combat attacks and powerful electrical strikes to defeat your enemies and reach the end!

name: Under The Concrete Wave
description: Under The Concrete Wave is a 3rd-person cooperative platformer where you alone or with friends take control of robots who have decided to leave the pit of monstrous brutalism. Jump, fall, throw objects, throw friends, solve puzzles (or not) on your way up.

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe: DLC 3
description: The DLC 3 for "The Hardest Game in the Universe" has arrived, bringing an extra dose of difficulty and challenging new enemies. Get ready to tackle complex environments, new traps, and a variety of cunning adversaries.

name: OMSI 2: Add-on Zürich Tram Linie 11
description: Having a tram as a vehicle in OMSI 2, now you have the opportunity to drive through the mere center of Zurich and enjoy the classical, intact and divine architecture of this unique worldwide famous city.

name: Train Simulator: EA-692
description: A Romanian rail icon arrives from developer Train Motion.

name: Train Simulator: Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 02
description: Experience challenging Stevens Pass railroading during the remarkable and memorable era of the Burlington Northern - with Stevens Pass Scenario Pack 02 from High Iron Simulations!

name: Train Simulator: Payerbach - Wien Hbf Route Add-On
description: Explore the east side of Austria from Wien (Vienna) to Payerbach with this Train Simulator route from RSSLO.

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 4748
description: Take control of this modern electric multiple unit from RSSLO, as you drive across the Austrian / Italian border.

name: Idle Champions: Solarya the Ki-rin Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Solarya the Ki-rin Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Selise Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Selise (if you don't already own them) Wyrm Slayer Selise Skin An Epic Feat for Selise 7 Gold Selise Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer BBEG Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion BBEG (if you don't already own them) Wyrm Slayer BBEG Skin An Epic Feat for BBEG 7 Gold BBEG Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Ezmerelda Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Ezmerelda (if you don't already have them) Wyrm Slayer Ezmerelda Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Ezmerelda 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Ezmerelda Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Ms. Squiggles the Octopus Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Ms. Squiggles the Octopus Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish

name: Vrsus Dead
description: So many zombies and so few bullets!

name: Hamlet in a Pond
description: Hamlet in a Pond is a unique looking relaxed city builder. Live out your creativity and build your own little slice of paradise in a tiny pond - with no pressure like goals to reach and no stress from juggling resources.

name: Duck Creator 2
description: Duck Creator 2, Create your own Duck but better version!

name: Saikin MMO
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Saikin by Shiryu Studios. Explore fantastical worlds, battle fierce enemies, and uncover secrets that will change your journey. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, Saikin will keep you on the edge of your seat. Play now and experience the magic!

name: Genso Manège
description: Follow Emma as she fights to reawaken her magical powers in order to aid a unique cast of characters, all of whom are trapped inside a travelling amusement park. Having lost memories from youth, Emma must rediscover her past through love and friendship in this stunning dream-like fantasy otome.

name: Free Stars: Children of Infinity
description: Experience a stellar space adventure and the sequel to The Ur-Quan Masters. Travel through hyperspace, engage in fast-paced combat, discover weird worlds, and meet a unique cast of truly alien aliens as you uncover a mystery that threatens the galaxy.

name: _Turing
description: "_turing" is a new sci-fi adventure game that allows the player to chat with the heroine during the story and teach her feelings to the AI heroine, thereby changing her personality and the outcome of the story. What will happen to you and Iris after you learn about her feelings?

name: The Dragonspire
description: It is a dark modern world with a massive surprise to Fantasy, including Scandals, Corruption, Death, Tough Choices, and entire Character Progression while the shape of the world around you changes. The romance you will experience along the way will be rewarding and have an in-depth storyline.

name: One of Them
description: One of Them is a Social Deduction sci-fi horror game. Up to 12 players are playing either as a Human Astronaut trying to escape, or as a disguised Alien Beast out to kill everyone.

name: Sinderfury
description: From a team of two developers, an INDIE co-op action RPG for 1 - 4 players. Warning: This ARPG has very little hand holding, and is designed for more hardcore players looking for a challenge. The systems are in depth, the bosses are brutal, and the demons are unrelenting.

name: Uphill
description: A precision platformer that allows you to alter the environment.

name: Ragdoll Tumble
description: I love ragdolls and I love physics, so I thought I would mush the two together with a level editor and make a cool sandbox game for people to play around in. Currently, there is a very basic JSON-based level editor and 20 pre-built levels.

name: Whiskers Wonderland
description: Whiskers Wonderland: a game where your pops sent you to find something that was lost in a restaurant, but be warned, Mr Whiskers doesn't like trespassers and you unfortunately are one, so he's after you... You do remember another robot named Dr Mouser. Ready to find what happend to him?

name: The Cursed Land
description: Embark on a mystical MMORPG adventure with "The Cursed Land"—a world of ancient myths, diverse classes, and strategic combat where every choice forges your destiny.

name: Survive Ten Days
description: "Survive Ten Days" is an open-world survival game in a post-apocalyptic setting, where players will face threats such as resource scarcity, zombies, and other survivors.

name: Finch & Archie
description: An episodic co-op murder mystery in which you play as one half of a crime-fighting duo: Jack Finch the detective or Archie the police dog! Use your skills to find evidence, interrogate suspects, and catch the culprit in a gritty 1930s setting.

name: Peter's Journey
description: Embark on a journey of this text anime quest with RPG elements! Walk through beautiful locations, overcome challenges and make Peter’s dreams come true. Every step you take matters. And don’t forget to take the diary - you’ll need it!

name: Casual Trucking
description: Drive your truck and deliver the cargo, buy properties and accumulate wealth

name: Super Party Games Online
description: Do you love minigames? Looking to play online with friends with no limits? Meet Super Party Games Online, and find a varied choice of minigames for a fun-filled online party gaming experience with your friends. With the ability to play with up to 3 friends to bring your social gatherings to life!

name: Project Werewolf
description: Enter a world full of mystical dangers in the merciless northern Sweden. Uncover the dark secrets of the werewolves as you fight for survival in a relentless open world. Will you solve the puzzle of the beasts and conquer them?

name: Trainz 2022: SA CL Class - RailPower Pack
description: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives owned by RailPower; these being CLF2 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), CLF4 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), and CLP11/13 22+ (ex QRN Yellow/Black/Maroon).

name: Trainz Plus: BR Diesel Brake Tenders
description: This pack contains 3 types of British Railways (BR) brake tenders, 2 prototypes and 1 main production variant, which includes 3 different types of bogies, with 3 different period liveries in clean and weathered versions.

name: Trainz Plus: C44aci Locomotive - ARG/Mineral Resources Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators, including ARG and Mineral Resources on a variety of freight services across Australia.

name: Trainz Plus: Model Trainz - Freemont Mills
description: Model Trainz: Freemont Mills is inspired from the Jan. 2024 issue of Model Railroader by Steven Otte. While small, there are plenty of operations that can be performed which can turn into a challenge.

name: Trainz Plus: ProTrain - AC4400CW Loco Bundle 1
description: Get five detailed AC4400 Locomotives in Union Pacific, Canadian Pacific, Southern Pacific and Kansas City Southern liveries.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - SD40-2 Loco Bundle 4
description: The SD40-2 was introduced in January 1972 as part of EMD's Dash 2 series, competing against the GE U30C and the ALCO Century 630. Get four new liveries of this locomotive.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - Sequoia Valley
description: Climbing through the steep Sequoia Valley, this route set in the Badgers Pass county connects Fox City and Elk River to Wilmington and finally Sequoia Falls. This route includes 4 new sessions, and CP AC4400CW and SD40-2 locomotives, and UP SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Trainz Plus: Milton Valley Railroad
description: The Milton Valley Railroad (MVR) is a fictional railroad based in North Carolina, its reach extending at the height of its power all the way north to Canada and south to Georgia. The MVR as represented in this route is currently in the 1960s transitional era, featuring both diesel and steam locos.

name: Trainz Plus: SA CL Class - QR National Pack
description: TheCLP Class were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features the CLP locomotive owned by Queensland Rail National, CLP 11 and CLP 13, in their iconic yellow, black and maroon 'Eagle' livery.

name: Trainz Plus: SA CL Class - RailPower Pack
description: The CLF and CLP Classes were rebuilt as 3,300hp locomotives, with an EMD V16-645E3C engine in the 1990s. This pack features four CLF and CLP locomotives owned by RailPower; these being CLF2 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), CLF4 20+ (ex GWA Orange & Black), and CLP11/13 22+ (ex QRN Yellow/Black/Maroon).
